about_the_game:
Summary

Battle for the Kingdom is a top-down strategy game where you fight an enemy army for control of a land. The game features a 15-level campaign and an endless, randomly generated mode for limitless content. Control your units and send them out to take control of towns along the path to crush your foes!

Background

We are a team entirely composed of volunteers for Games For Love, a 501(c)(3) charity dedicated to easing suffering, saving lives, and creating sustainable futures for children. When you buy this game, the proceeds go towards our goal of helping 10 million children all over the world by 2025. We did the math! Every 10 dollars Games For Love receives impacts 2.42 kids, so you can be confident that when you buy Battle For The Kingdom, you are personally helping kids in need.
